title: Rrogozhinë - Fier - Vlorë Railway Rehabilitation and Upgrade (ONGOING)
description:
Corridor review and engineering support for the rehabilitation and upgrade of the Rrogozhinë – Fier – Vlorë railway line.

Including:

  • Review of the existing railway corridor and infrastructure
  • Development and refinement of the Digital Terrain Model (DTM) based on survey data, ASIG datasets, and orthophotos
  • Retracing, adjustment, and optimization of the existing horizontal and vertical alignment, including alignment improvement options
  • Development of railway alignment options, including connection options to Vlora Airport, and contribution to multi-criteria alignment selection
  • Preparation of horizontal and vertical alignment drawings, overview layouts, and typical cross-sections
  • Assistance in the assessment and design development of major and minor structures, including bridges, culverts, stations, and level crossings
  • Hydraulic and drainage considerations integrated within the corridor and alignment design
  • Preparation of preliminary and final idea design documentation, drawings, and reports
  • Preparation of Bills of Quantities and cost estimates for railway-related disciplines
  • Ensuring compliance with TSI requirements, Albanian railway standards, and applicable technical regulations

title: Feasibility study and Preliminary Design of Durres – Prishtine Railway
description:
Strategic corridor analysis and preliminary engineering design for a new railway link between Durres (Albania) and Prishtina (Kosovo).

Including:

  • Feasibility study and concept design for the railway connection
  • Alignment studies and cross-border connectivity analysis
  • Economic and social impact assessment
  • Preliminary technical documentation for regional integration

title: Tirana – Durrës Railway and Airport Connection
description:
Detailed engineering consulting for the Tirana – Durrës line and new Rinas Airport connection.

Including:

  • Preliminary and detailed design of the railway connection to Tirana International Airport
  • Development of horizontal and vertical railway alignment, including studies, longitudinal and transversal profiles
  • Drainage and hydraulic design, including surface water management, culverts, and drainage channels
  • Coordination with existing railway infrastructure, road crossings, utilities, and airport-related constraints
  • Preparation of preliminary design documentation and detailed design for execution
  • Contribution to tender documentation, including technical specifications and quantities

title: Tirana Urban Railway Section (Terminal – City Station)
description:
Design of the urban railway section between Tirana Terminal Station and Tirana City Station (approximately 5 km).

Including:

  • Review and optimization of the existing urban railway corridor under dense city constraints
  • Development of horizontal and vertical railway alignment, compliant with operational and safety requirements
  • Design of station areas, including track layout, platforms, and integration with the surrounding urban fabric
  • Hydraulic and drainage design, including surface water management and urban drainage connections
  • Coordination with existing roads, utilities, structures, and buildings along the corridor
  • Preparation of technical specifications, bills of quantities, and the full tender documentation package

title: Durres Water Supply Network Optimization
description:
Consulting services for the optimized action plan and detailed design of the Durres water network.

Including:

  • Preparation of project deliverables: D-7 Optimized Action Plan Report and D-8 Detailed Design of Action Plan Interventions
  • Detailed design of priority investment measures, including pressure reducing valves, pumping facilities, and reservoirs
  • Network rehabilitation works and hydraulic modeling optimization
  • Preparation of Bills of Quantities, cost estimates, and technical specifications
  • Preparation of tender and bid packages for implementation interventions

title: Hydraulic Verification of Main Pipelines – Durres
description:
Technical verification and hydraulic analysis of the main transmission pipelines supplying Durres.

Including:

  • Preparation of geotechnical and structural calculations for engineering measures along critical pipeline segments
  • Identification of bottlenecks and proposals for capacity upgrades
  • Preparation of technical specifications and supporting documentation for construction
  • Coordination with the Contractor during design review stages

title: Short-term Technical Support/Design Review (Infrastructure)
description:
Provision of hydraulic modelling and water supply design services for the Durrës Water Supply and Sanitation Improvement Project.

Including:

  • Provision and use of all available data from previous water network modelling and zoning studies (LOTTI, 2018 - World Bank financed)
  • Hydraulic modelling of bulk water supply systems, including Fushë Kuqe, Fushë Milot, and Fushë Kruja transmission systems
  • Use of WaterGEMS software for hydraulic modelling, analysis, and scenario development
  • Technical support to the Project Manager during model development and validation

title: Qukës – Qafë Pllocë Road Corridor
description:
Design of an approximately 10 km road section along the Tirana-Korça Road Corridor.

Including:

  • Geometric and structural design for the challenging mountainous road corridor
  • Design of viaducts, tunnels, and extensive slope protection measures
  • Preparation of technical specifications, quantities, and supporting design documentation

title: Muzak Topia Road – Berat
description:
Road reconstruction design for "Muzak Topia" Road in the UNESCO heritage city of Berat.

Including:

  • Review of the existing road corridor and assessment of geometric and structural deficiencies
  • Optimization of horizontal and vertical alignment for safety and compliance
  • Detailed design of pavement, drainage, and urban integration

title: Shna Ndou Church (Kisha e Laçit)
description:
Structural assessment and rehabilitation design for the pilgrimage site of Shna Ndou Church.

Including:

  • Structural design of the church complex, including the main building and associated ancillary structures
  • Ensuring compliance with applicable structural codes and design standards
  • Structural safety assessment for high visitor loads

title: Shell Albania – Drilling Sites Infrastructure
description:
Civil engineering design for drilling site infrastructure and raw water supply systems.

Including:

  • Hydraulic design of raw water supply systems, including abstraction works and transmission mains
  • Estimation of water demand for drilling operations, domestic use, and fire protection
  • Design of transmission pipelines, including hydraulic calculations, sizing, and profiling
  • Stormwater drainage design and erosion control
  • Environmental impact considerations related to water abstraction

title: Jale Tourist & Residential Complex
description:
Tourist, residential and services complex Phase l, II, III, IV with frontage in Jale, Himara Municipality.

Including:

  • Technical responsibility and coordination for infrastructure works across Nucleus 1, Nucleus 2, Nucleus 3, and Nucleus 4
  • Preparation and management of the Digital Terrain Model (DTM) and georeferencing
  • Design of internal roads, parking areas, and site grading (geomteric layout, pavement, earthworks)
  • Design of water supply, stormwater drainage, and sewerage networks for all nuclei
  • Preparation of excavation and earthworks plans for buildings
  • Technical coordination and guidance of the construction team
